general.gigTitle: fix and develop website as full stack php laravel developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: I will develop and manage websites for you
sellerCard.description:
Good work and low price is combination difficult to find but here it is available. Dedication to work and deliver before deadline is main priority.  If you are looking for web development, it is best option to be done here.
Regards

description.content:
Please Contact Me First to Discuss Issues before Placing Order.


I am Providing Following Services:


  1. Debug and fix PHP Laravel, JQuery, Ajax, Vue JS code.
  • Payment Gateways Integration (Stripe, Paypal, Wise, Flutterwave, Coin Payment, TransBank Webpay plus)
  1. Third Party Topup and Billing Solutioin Platforms Integration (Reloadly, DTOne, Ding Connect, ValueTopup, MyPaga)
  2. Laravel Package Development and Fix Bugs
  3. Write Cron Jobs Commands to schedule tasks automatically
  4. API integration and Writing APIs
  5. Write Middlewares
  6. Twillio API Integration
  7. Resolve and fix HTML, CSS issue
  8. Responsiveness Issues.
  9. Fix website Errors
  10. Fix Website Performance Issues
  11. Write PHP code as per your requirement.
  12. Integrate Digital Ocean and AWS Storage Bucket with Laravel to store images and files on Bucket and fetch that to show on Laravel Website.
  13. Website deployment to Server


I am working as PHP developer having 7+ years experience and I can develop web applications using PHP Laravel, HTML, CSS, VUE JS and MySql. I am expert in MVC pattern PHP Frameworks. There will be no issue regarding coding style.

slide.name: fix and develop website as full stack php laravel developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help with the deployment of my Laravel application?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely, I can assist with deploying your Laravel application to various hosting environments like Hostinger, including shared hosting, VPS, and cloud services like AWS and Heroku.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer post-development support and maintenance?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your application remains secure, up-to-date, and performs optimally.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What services do you offer with this gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I offer a range of services including full-stack web development, fixing bugs, adding new features, optimizing performance, and developing custom web applications using PHP and Laravel.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate third-party APIs into my Laravel application?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can integrate various third-party APIs such as payment gateways, social media logins, and other external services into your Laravel application.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need to start working on my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need detailed requirements for your project, access to your web hosting/server, database credentials, and any relevant documentation or existing codebase.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the typical timeline for completing a project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity and scope of the project. A small fix might take a few hours, while a full web application could take several weeks. We can discuss and agree on a timeline before starting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you handle project updates and communication?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I provide regular updates on the project's progress through Fiverr messages or other communication tools like Slack or email. I'm always available to answer any questions and address concerns promptly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you work with other technologies besides Laravel and PHP?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I also work with front-end technologies like Tailwind CSS, Vue JS, React JS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This allows me to develop complete full-stack applications that are both functional and visually appealing.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer custom Laravel package development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can develop custom Laravel packages to extend the functionality of your application as per your specific requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you write automated tests for the application?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can write automated tests for your application using Laravel's built-in testing tools to ensure your application functions correctly and remains robust over time.

packageList.title: Small Fixes
packageList.description: Small issue , bugs & tasks fix (Overall 2 hour Work) Please contact me before placing order

packageList.title: STANDARD
packageList.description: Approx 5 pages informative website. (please discuss for custom offer)
